# ::snt Alhamdulillah..kirim salam rindu kat mak
(a / and
      :op1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Alhamdulillah"))
      :op2 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Salam"))
      :op3 (p3 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Rindu"))
      :op4 (p4 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Kat"
                  :op2 "Mak")))
